value:
$WmMPID_舞踏キュアン,ch06_14_Cuan_M_Dance20,Face|Stay near to me, Ethlyn, lest you
find yourself in danger.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エスリン,ch06_15_Ethlin_F_Dance20,Face|Please, forgive me, Quan.$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏エルトシャン,ch06_01_Eltshan_M_Dance20,Face|We may have lost before, but not
this time. We will not hold back!$k$p$WmMPID_舞踏ラケシス,ch06_02_Rackesis_F_Dance20,Face|Well said, Eldigan.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_MF_Pair,Face|Fear not, Deirdre. No matter what
may come, I will protect you.$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|I trust you, Lord Sigurd.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ディアドラ,ch06_04_Siglud_MF_Pair,Face|This ball... It is all coming
to an end...$k$p$nMPID_比翼シグルド|You look uneasy, Deirdre.
What troubles you?$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|It...it's like a dream come true...
Spending this time together with
you and the others, smiling.$k$pI fear if I but blink, it might all
disappear in that instant...$k$p$nMPID_比翼シグルド|Deirdre... There is nothing to fear.
I will be ever at your side.$k$pNo matter what fate may have
in store for us, I will fight it—and
I will be victorious. For you.$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|Oh, Lord Sigurd... You have my every
faith. Please, never leave me...$k$p$nMPID_比翼シグルド|You have my word.$k$p...And with that, would you do me
the honor of joining me for another
dance, my dearest Deirdre?$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|Hee hee... Of course, Lord Sigurd.
It would be my pleasure.$k$p$Sbs150|
